questions_and_notes: Cell_methods include "where sea".  Description says this should be a 2-d field, not 3-d.  If so, eliminate olevel dimension.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean within years time: mean over years
long_name: Tendency of Ocean Potential Energy Content
comment: Rate that work is done against vertical stratification, as measured by the vertical heat and salt diffusivity. Report here as depth integrated two-dimensional field.
